title.narrative: BJ-Forest & Adjacent Land Mgmt Addit Fin

description.narrative: The PDO/GEO of the original project will remain the same as the PDO/GEO of the additional financing, i.e. “to assist the Recipientin its effort to lay down the foundation for a collective integrated ecosystem management system of its forests and adjacent lands”.

participating-org.narrative: General Direction of Forests and Natural Resources (DGFRN)
